item.description:
The business and consumer landscape is continuously evolving through new technology. With this changing climate marketers are also improving their tactics and methods, but many executives haven't caught up. 

Join Kathy Tito, inbound marketing guru, on Thursday May 24, 2:00-2:30 PM EDT as she discusses how social media and continuous content generation are paramount to the success of companies in today's unstable marketplace, as well as, the many other tools being utilized by today's marketers.  Learn how to effectively communicate your marketing strategy and how it will be evaluated.

What: Inbound Marketing: Shifting Budgets, Shifting Expectations
When: May 24, 2012, 2-2:30 ET
REGISTER HERE: https://www3.gotomeeting.com/register/315203942
item.name: Inbound Marketing: How to sell the executive on your mktg strategy
